testcase.name: User can add product to their cart
testcase.system-out: Given User already on Product Page..........................................passed When User click button Add to Cart..........................................passed And User click the cart icon button.........................................passed Then User will be redirected to Cart Page...................................passed And The product will be displayed on cart...................................passed

testcase.name: User can checkout the product
testcase.system-out: Given User already login and add product to the cart........................passed And User access the Cart Page...............................................passed When User click Checkout Button.............................................passed Then User will be redirected to Your Information Page.......................passed And User input the First Name...............................................passed And User input the Last Name................................................passed And User input the ZipPostal Code...........................................passed When User click the Continue Button.........................................passed Then User will be redirected to Overview Page...............................passed When User click the Finish Button...........................................passed Then User will be redirected to Complete Order Page.........................passed

testcase.name: User login with valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given User access the SauceDemo login page..................................passed When User input the registered username.....................................passed And User input the registered password......................................passed And User click the Login Button.............................................passed Then User will be redirected to Products Page...............................passed

testcase.name: User login with invalid credential
testcase.system-out: Given User access the SauceDemo login page..................................passed When User input the unregistered username...................................passed And User input the unregistered password....................................passed And User click the Login Button.............................................passed Then Error message will be displayed........................................passed

testcase.name: User can logout from the website
testcase.system-out: Given User already login with the registered account........................passed When User click hamburger icon menu.........................................passed And Sidebar menu will be displayed..........................................passed And User click the logout button............................................passed Then User will be redirected to login page..................................passed
